title: (x) Selnaustrasse condensed humanist sans - Frutiger {Dav}
content:
Hy everybody,  
its my first post, hope you are allright?!  
Please, perhaps you can tell me, what font this could be?  
I’m shure you can. :-)  
See you and thanks,  
Ochi

comments.content: It looks unnaturally condensed to me, though.
